sections.work_environment: Are you seeking a rewarding career opportunity within the Department of National Defence (DND) in the Eastern Region? Look no further. This process is designed to identify talented individuals seeking to make a difference and grow professionally while surrounded by the history of our nation, and vibrant life simultaneously. Whether you want to be submerged in nature, or immersed in energy of the metropolitan cities, Quebec, Montreal and their surrounding areas awaits you.If you are looking for a change or looking to further your career, this process is tailored to candidates LIKE YOU to cater to the information technology needs of the Eastern Region.Together, DND and the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) form the largest and most complex organization in Canada. DND's role is to provide services and support to the CAF in their operations and missions at home and abroad. DND and the CAF work side-by-side to fulfill the Government of Canada‚Äôs mission to defend Canada and Canadians and contribute to international peace, security and stability efforts.Don't miss out on this chance to expand your skillset and career journey within DND and apply now!

sections.intent_of_process: A pool of partially or essentially qualified candidates may be established through this process and used to staff identical or similar positions with various employment tenures (temporary and permanent), various language profiles, operational requirements, and conditions of employment at the Department of National Defence which includes the Canadian Coast Guard.In line with Treasury Board Secretariat (TBS) direction, the Department of National Defence has adopted a common hybrid work model where employees work at their designated worksite at least 3 days each week, or 60% of their regular schedule.
